languages.text: "Маражай Эзирраеш, учитывая все... обстоятельства," {n}— архонт оглядывает залу и останавливает тревожный взгляд на прервавшем его ксеносе в пестрых доспехах, —{/n} "совет признает архонта Иремерисс виновной. Клинок твоей истины прорубил теневую вуаль, скрывавшую ее прегрешения. Однако..." {n}В его глазах появляется жестокая издевка.{/n} "Как смел ты оскорбить совет столь ничтожной жалобой? Ты должен был своими руками вырвать сердце Иремерисс и даровать ее душу Векту в качестве прощения за ошибки Опустошительной бури".

traits.locale_text: "Маражай Эзирраеш, учитывая все... обстоятельства," {n}- архонт оглядывает залу и останавливает тревожный взгляд на прервавшем его ксеносе в пестрых доспехах, -{/n} "совет признает Архонта Иремерисс виновной. Клинок твоей истины прорубил теневую вуаль, скрывавшую ее прегрешения. Однако как смел ты оскорбить совет своими бесполезными жалобами? Или надеяться, что Архонт Черного Сердца бросится решать никчемные проблемы твоего кабала? Ты должен был своими руками вырвать сердце Иремерисс и даровать ее душу Векту в качестве прощения за ошибки Опустошительной Бури".
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: "Marazhai Aezyrraesh, considering the circumstances..." {n}The Archon looks around the room and rests his troubled gaze on the xenos in bright armour who interrupted him.{/n} "The council finds Archon Yremeryss guilty. The blade of your truth cut through the shadowy veil concealing her transgressions. However..." {n}A glint of cruel mockery appears in his eyes.{/n} "How dare you insult the council with such a pathetic complaint? You should have ripped Yremeryss's heart out with your own hands and granted her soul to Vect if you wanted to atone for the mistakes of the Reaving Tempest."
languages.original_text: "Маражай Эзирраеш, учитывая все... обстоятельства," {n}— архонт оглядывает залу и останавливает тревожный взгляд на прервавшем его ксеносе в пестрых доспехах, —{/n} "совет признает архонта Иремерисс виновной. Клинок твоей истины прорубил теневую вуаль, скрывавшую ее прегрешения. Однако..." {n}В его глазах появляется жестокая издевка.{/n} "Как смел ты оскорбить совет столь ничтожной жалобой? Ты должен был своими руками вырвать сердце Иремерисс и даровать ее душу Векту в качестве прощения за ошибки Опустошительной бури".

traits.locale_text: "Marazhai Aezyrraesh, considering the... circumstances," {n}— the archon looks around the room and stops his troubled gaze on the xenos in bright armour who interrupted him, —{/n} "the council finds archon Yremeriss guilty. The blade of your truth cut through the shadowy veil concealing her transgressions. But how dare you insult the council with your useless complaints? Did you hope the archon of the Black Heart would rush to resolve the petty squabbles of your Kabal? You should have ripped Yremeriss's heart out with your own hands and granted her soul to Vect if you wanted to atone for the mistakes of the Reaving Tempest."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: “玛拉斋·艾泽拉什，考虑到当下的情况……”{n}执政官环顾房间，目光不安地停留在那位穿着明亮外袍、打断他说话的异形身上。{/n}“……议会认为执政官伊芮梅莉斯是有罪的。你的真理之刃划破了她阴暗的面纱，揭露了她的罪行。不过……”{n}他眼中闪过了一丝残酷的嘲弄意味。{/n}“你竟敢用这种无关紧要的小事来打扰议会？如果你真的打算为狂风阴谋团犯下的过错赎罪，你本该亲手挖出伊芮梅莉斯的心脏，将她的灵魂献给维克特才对。”
languages.original_text: "Marazhai Aezyrraesh, considering the circumstances..." {n}The Archon looks around the room and rests his troubled gaze on the xenos in bright armour who interrupted him.{/n} "The council finds Archon Yremeryss guilty. The blade of your truth cut through the shadowy veil concealing her transgressions. However..." {n}A glint of cruel mockery appears in his eyes.{/n} "How dare you insult the council with such a pathetic complaint? You should have ripped Yremeryss's heart out with your own hands and granted her soul to Vect if you wanted to atone for the mistakes of the Reaving Tempest."

traits.locale_text: “玛拉斋·艾泽拉什，考虑到当下的情况……”{n}执政官环顾房间，目光不安地停留在那位穿着明亮外袍、打断他说话的异形身上。{/n}“……议会认为执政官伊芮梅莉斯是有罪的。你的真理之刃划破了她阴暗的面纱，揭露了她的罪行。不过……”{n}他眼中闪过了一丝残酷的嘲弄意味。{/n}“你竟敢用这种无关紧要的小事来打扰议会？如果你真的打算为狂风阴谋团犯下的过错赎罪，你本该亲手挖出伊芮梅莉斯的心脏，将她的灵魂献给维克特才对。”
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: 「マラズハイ・アエジレシュ、この状況を鑑みて…」{n}アーコンは部屋を見渡して、悩ましげな視線を彼の邪魔をした鮮やかな防具を着た異種族に向けた。{/n}「…評議会はアーコン・イレメリスを有罪とする。お前の真実は彼女の罪を隠す影のベールを切り裂いた。だが…」{n}彼の目には、残酷な、嘲るような光が浮かんでいる。{/n}「よくも貴様の無駄な苦言で評議会を侮辱したな。略奪の嵐の過ちを償いたいのなら、自らの手でイレメリスの心臓を引き裂き、彼女の魂をヴェクトに捧げるべきだった」
languages.original_text: "Marazhai Aezyrraesh, considering the circumstances..." {n}The Archon looks around the room and rests his troubled gaze on the xenos in bright armour who interrupted him.{/n} "The council finds Archon Yremeryss guilty. The blade of your truth cut through the shadowy veil concealing her transgressions. However..." {n}A glint of cruel mockery appears in his eyes.{/n} "How dare you insult the council with such a pathetic complaint? You should have ripped Yremeryss's heart out with your own hands and granted her soul to Vect if you wanted to atone for the mistakes of the Reaving Tempest."

traits.locale_text: 「マラズハイ・アエジレシュ、この状況を鑑みて…」{n}アーコンは部屋を見渡して、悩ましげな視線を彼の邪魔をした鮮やかな防具を着た異種族に向けた。{/n}「…評議会はアーコン・イレメリスを有罪とする。お前の真実は彼女の罪を隠す影のベールを切り裂いた。だが…」{n}彼の目には、残酷な、嘲るような光が浮かんでいる。{/n}「よくも貴様の無駄な苦言で評議会を侮辱したな。略奪の嵐の過ちを償いたいのなら、自らの手でイレメリスの心臓を引き裂き、彼女の魂をヴェクトに捧げるべきだった」
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: «Marazhai Aezyrraesh, teniendo en cuenta las circunstancias...». {n}El Arconte pasa su mirada preocupada por la sala hasta detenerla en el xenos de armadura brillante que le ha interrumpido.{/n} «... El Consejo declara a Yremeryss culpable. El filo de tu verdad ha rasgado el velo sombrío que ocultaba sus transgresiones. Pero... {n}Un brillo cruel y burlón atraviesa su mirada.{/n} ¿Cómo osas insultar al Consejo con una queja tan lamentable? Deberías haber arrancado el corazón de Yremeryss con tus propias manos y entregado su alma a Vect si pretendías compensar los errores de la Tempestad Asoladora».
languages.original_text: "Marazhai Aezyrraesh, considering the circumstances..." {n}The Archon looks around the room and rests his troubled gaze on the xenos in bright armour who interrupted him.{/n} "The council finds Archon Yremeryss guilty. The blade of your truth cut through the shadowy veil concealing her transgressions. However..." {n}A glint of cruel mockery appears in his eyes.{/n} "How dare you insult the council with such a pathetic complaint? You should have ripped Yremeryss's heart out with your own hands and granted her soul to Vect if you wanted to atone for the mistakes of the Reaving Tempest."

traits.locale_text: «Marazhai Aezyrraesh, teniendo en cuenta las circunstancias...». {n}El Arconte pasa su mirada preocupada por la sala hasta detenerla en el xenos de armadura brillante que le ha interrumpido.{/n} «... El Consejo declara a Yremeryss culpable. El filo de tu verdad ha rasgado el velo sombrío que ocultaba sus transgresiones. Pero... {n}Un brillo cruel y burlón atraviesa su mirada.{/n} ¿Cómo osas insultar al Consejo con una queja tan lamentable? Deberías haber arrancado el corazón de Yremeryss con tus propias manos y entregado su alma a Vect si pretendías compensar los errores de la Tempestad Asoladora».
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: « Marazhai Aezyrraesh, étant donné les circonstances... » {n}L'archonte promène son regard perturbé sur l'assemblée avant de l'arrêter sur la xénos en armure rutilante qui l'a interrompu.{/n} « Le Conseil déclare l'archonte Yremeryss coupable. La lame de votre vérité a transpercé le voile dissimulant ses transgressions. Néanmoins, {n}ajoute-t-il avec une lueur de moquerie dans le regard,{/n} comment osez-vous ennuyer le Conseil avec une plainte sans intérêt ? Si vous vouliez expier les péchés de la Tempête ravageuse, vous auriez dû arracher vous-même le cœur d'Yremeryss et déposer son âme aux pieds de Vect. »
languages.original_text: "Marazhai Aezyrraesh, considering the circumstances..." {n}The Archon looks around the room and rests his troubled gaze on the xenos in bright armour who interrupted him.{/n} "The council finds Archon Yremeryss guilty. The blade of your truth cut through the shadowy veil concealing her transgressions. However..." {n}A glint of cruel mockery appears in his eyes.{/n} "How dare you insult the council with such a pathetic complaint? You should have ripped Yremeryss's heart out with your own hands and granted her soul to Vect if you wanted to atone for the mistakes of the Reaving Tempest."

traits.locale_text: « Marazhai Aezyrraesh, étant donné les circonstances... » {n}L'archonte promène son regard perturbé sur l'assemblée avant de l'arrêter sur la xénos en armure rutilante qui l'a interrompu.{/n} « Le Conseil déclare l'archonte Yremeryss coupable. La lame de votre vérité a transpercé le voile dissimulant ses transgressions. Néanmoins, {n}ajoute-t-il avec une lueur de moquerie dans le regard,{/n} comment osez-vous ennuyer le Conseil avec une plainte sans intérêt ? Si vous vouliez expier les péchés de la Tempête ravageuse, vous auriez dû arracher vous-même le cœur d'Yremeryss et déposer son âme aux pieds de Vect. »
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: "Marazhai Aezyrraesh, angesichts der Umstände ..." {n}Der Archon sieht sich im Raum um und fixiert beunruhigt den Xenos in strahlender Rüstung, der ihn unterbrochen hat.{/n} "Der Rat befindet Archontin Yremeryss für schuldig. Die Klinge Eurer Wahrheit durchtrennte den Schattenschleier, der ihre Fehltritte verbarg. Allerdings ..." {n}In seinen Augen funkelt ein grausamer Spott.{/n} "Wie könnt Ihr es wagen, den Rat mit Eurer armseligen Beschwerde zu beleidigen? Ihr hättet Yremeryss' Herz mit eigener Hand herausreißen und ihre Seele Vect übergeben sollen, um die Fehler des plündernden Sturms wiedergutzumachen."
languages.original_text: "Marazhai Aezyrraesh, considering the circumstances..." {n}The Archon looks around the room and rests his troubled gaze on the xenos in bright armour who interrupted him.{/n} "The council finds Archon Yremeryss guilty. The blade of your truth cut through the shadowy veil concealing her transgressions. However..." {n}A glint of cruel mockery appears in his eyes.{/n} "How dare you insult the council with such a pathetic complaint? You should have ripped Yremeryss's heart out with your own hands and granted her soul to Vect if you wanted to atone for the mistakes of the Reaving Tempest."

traits.locale_text: "Marazhai Aezyrraesh, angesichts der Umstände ..." {n}Der Archon sieht sich im Raum um und fixiert beunruhigt den Xenos in strahlender Rüstung, der ihn unterbrochen hat.{/n} "... befindet der Rat Archontin Yremeryss für schuldig. Die Klinge Eurer Wahrheit zerschnitt den Schattenschleier, der ihre Fehltritte verbarg. Aber wie könnt Ihr es wagen, den Rat mit Euren nutzlosen Beschwerden zu beleidigen? Hofftet Ihr darauf, dass der Archon des Schwarzen Herzens herbeieilt, um die banalen Streitigkeiten Eurer Kabale beizulegen? Ihr hättet Yremeryss' Herz mit eigener Hand herausreißen und ihre Seele Vect übergeben sollen, um die Fehler des plündernden Sturms wiedergutzumachen."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: "Marazhai Aezyrraesh, içinde bulunduğumuz durum göz önüne alındığında..." {n}Arkon odaya göz gezdirip sıkıntılı bakışlarını, sözünü bölen parlak zırhlı zenoya kenetliyor.{/n} "Konsey, Arkon Yremeryss'i suçlu bulmuştur. Doğruluğunun kılıcı, onun suçlarını örten gölgeli örtüyü kesebilir ancak..." {n}Gözlerinde zalimce bir alaycılık parlıyor.{/n} "Konseyi böylesi zavallı bir şikâyetle aşağılamaya nasıl cüret edersin? Müfteris Kasırga'nın hatalarının kefaretini ödemek istiyordun madem, Yremeryss'in kalbini kendi ellerinle söküp ruhunu Vect'e sunman gerekirdi."
languages.original_text: "Marazhai Aezyrraesh, considering the circumstances..." {n}The Archon looks around the room and rests his troubled gaze on the xenos in bright armour who interrupted him.{/n} "The council finds Archon Yremeryss guilty. The blade of your truth cut through the shadowy veil concealing her transgressions. However..." {n}A glint of cruel mockery appears in his eyes.{/n} "How dare you insult the council with such a pathetic complaint? You should have ripped Yremeryss's heart out with your own hands and granted her soul to Vect if you wanted to atone for the mistakes of the Reaving Tempest."

traits.locale_text: "Marazhai Aezyrraesh, içinde bulunduğumuz durum göz önüne alındığında..." {n}Arkon odaya göz gezdiriyor ve sıkıntılı bakışlarını, sözünü bölen parlak zırhlı zenoya kenetliyor.{/n} "Konsey, Arkon Yremeryss'i suçlu bulmuştur. Doğruluğunun kılıcı, onun suçlarını örten gölgeli örtüyü kesebilir ancak..." {n}Gözlerinde zalimce bir alaycılık parlıyor.{/n} "Konseyi böylesi zavallı bir şikâyetle aşağılamaya nasıl cüret edersin? Müfteris Kasırga'nın hatalarının kefaretini ödemek istiyorduysan, Yremeryss'in kalbini kendi ellerinle sökmen ve ruhunu Vect'e sunman gerekirdi."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect
